title: How do I make a good Minecraft world?
self_text: So, I'm making a new Minecraft world and it's pretty boring. Like, there are some trees, but that's it. What would you guys suggest to make my world more interesting? Things like villages, custom biomes, dungeons... anything!

title: Does anyone have an idea for a large, intricate custom map?
self_text: I'm looking to build something really cool but I don't know where to start. I was thinking about a massive, winding maze with lots of hidden passages and secret rooms.  I’d like it to be challenging and rewarding, with puzzles that aren’t too hard but also not too easy. Any ideas on what kind of theme would work well or any specific mechanics to include? Maybe even some basic ideas on how to approach the building process?   Also, is there any particular block palette that works better than others for this sort of thing? I've been experimenting with grey concrete and sandstone but it's just not quite right. Thank you in advance!

title: Minecraft is my life, but I’m getting bored
self_text: I’ve been playing for over a decade now and I'm just... tired of it? I don't know what to do. I have built huge castles, explored every biome, made countless farms, and killed a ton of zombies. What should I do?  I was thinking about trying out other games but I'm afraid that they won't be as fun or rewarding as minecraft. Any suggestions?

title: Is there a way to make the armor stands not be able to move around as much?
self_text: I've been trying to build some structures, but the armor stands keep bumping into things and moving around on their own. Is there a way to prevent that or make it less annoying?

title: Minecraft World Border is Broken, How to Fix?
self_text: I'm trying to make a world border that will be around the whole world and it keeps getting broken down when I try to expand it further than 1000 blocks. It seems like the world border isn't able to get bigger than 1000 blocks, but why? Is there any way to fix this problem? Any help would be appreciated!

title: Minecraft Server crashes when trying to load a world after the server was shut down
self_text: I've been having issues with my minecraft server crashing when I try to load it, after shutting it down completely (using the stop command).  I have tried reinstalling the server, verifying file integrity and running as administrator but it still keeps crashing.  Any ideas?

title: What's your favorite Minecraft skin?
self_text: Just wondering what skins you guys like to use. I personally enjoy the ones that are simple but detailed, or those with a lot of personality!

title: Help with a specific Minecraft thing
self_text: I'm trying to create a custom world generation in minecraft, but the way it is created is really complex and I don't know how to do some of the things I need to do like setting up different layers or making certain biomes only appear at certain altitudes or something like that.  I would love any help you could give me on creating a custom world gen!

title: Can't seem to get a specific mob in my world
self_text: I was trying to make a large scale world with lots of different biomes and I have a lot of villages that are all over the place. I want to have lots of villagers that can trade but they keep dying out because there aren't enough for me to build up a trade station, so I tried making a bunch of them around a single village. Now they are all spawning in my world but not near any other villages. I tried moving some from one village to another but it doesn't work, what am I doing wrong?

title: Is there a way to make the world border more custom?
self_text: I want to be able to edit the world border in an easier way than what's currently available, for example, making it have a color gradient or having a curved shape. Does anyone know of any mods that do that or how to edit the .properties file?

title: Any tips for a new player?
self_text: I'm trying to play survival mode, but it is really hard. I just can't find any food and the zombies always kill me. I know that I should start with wood, but I don't want to make a bed or furnace yet.  Is there anything I can do to get through the first night?

self_text: I'm trying to set up some world settings (e.g., enable/disable command blocks, change skybox) and it's a huge pain to open up the whole game just to make minor tweaks. Is there any kind of in-game UI or editor that would allow me to modify these settings more quickly? I don’t want to have to use the console.

self_text: I'm looking for something that fits a lot of different moods, but it should be pretty chill and ambient. Something to listen to while building or exploring.  I have a lot of electronic/chillhop, but also would like something completely different. Any suggestions?

I need to know, what are some other people’s favorite songs or playlists that they listen to while building or exploring?  I tend to like calmer stuff, but sometimes I want something with more energy, too!  (Bonus points if you have a specific song you always play while mining.)

I am running windows 10 with an RTX 2060 and i5 9400f.   Can anyone help?  Is there anything else I should do?

I have it set up so that when I place a specific block, it copies a certain structure into the location of the block. I even tried using a different method but the same thing still happens. Is there any way around this or something I’m doing wrong?

self_text: I've been playing Minecraft for a long time and have never had any problems with my worlds. However, recently, my world has started to get corrupted, and when I try to load it up, it freezes on the loading screen.  I've tried restarting the game and my computer but that hasn't worked. It also doesn't seem like there is anything in the world that could be causing this problem. So I'm really starting to worry about my favorite world being lost forever.  Is there anything I can do to prevent this? Does anyone know how to fix it?

title: Minecraft Bedrock Edition - How to get the perfect diamond sword
self_text: I’ve been trying for weeks and can't seem to get a perfect diamond sword (sharpness, efficiency, looting, unbreaking, fortune, and mending). What are some tips on how to get it?  I have already crafted a diamond sword with all of those enchantments but I am not getting enough durability.

title: How do I keep the sun in my Minecraft world?
self_text: I want to build a massive city, and I'm trying to simulate daylight for most of it, but there are sections where I don't want any light at all. Is there an easy way to do that, or is this something you have to manually manage?

title: Minecraft - Is it possible to have a permanent, in-game scoreboard that tracks the number of players who have built something in a certain area?
self_text: I'm trying to create a game mode where people are rewarded for building impressive structures in specific areas. However, I want to track how many players have contributed to these builds and display an in-game scoreboard to show the collective effort. I've tried using commands like `/scoreboard objectives` and `/scoreboard results`, but they aren't providing me with the information I need. The problem is that it only shows individual player scores, not the cumulative score of all players working on a project together.  Is there a way to achieve this kind of tracking within Minecraft without relying on external tools or mods?

title: How to prevent Minecraft from loading the world when I try to launch it again.
self_text: After a few days of playing, my computer has started automatically launching Minecraft and trying to load the world. This is happening even though I have not launched it manually in days. It's very annoying. I've tried multiple things like restarting my PC, updating drivers, deleting the world and re-downloading it. I have no idea what to do anymore. Does anyone know how to prevent this? Also, does anyone know if there are any settings in the game itself that could be causing this problem?

title: I accidentally destroyed my world with the newest update and now I have to start over... help?

I got caught up experimenting with biomes, and somehow managed to get into an infinite loop of spawning and dying. However, due to the sheer number of blocks that had been destroyed, I lost almost all my progress and resources.  Now I'm starting over from scratch. I’ve decided to start over, but I want to do things a little differently this time around. Is there any way I can change my mindset and just be more positive about playing with him? Any advice?

title: Minecraft Bedrock Edition - How to remove a player from the world?
self_text: I'm working on an offline multiplayer world and I've accidentally added someone who I no longer want in my world.  I can't seem to find a way to remove them without deleting the entire world.  Is there any way to just remove a player from the world?

title: Does anyone else hate the sound of blocks breaking in Minecraft?
self_text: I've been playing for years and it drives me crazy. It just sounds really grating.

title: How do I transfer a world from bedrock to bedrock?
self_text: Hey, anyone know how I can get my minecraft bedrock world from bedrock on ps4 onto bedrock on pc? Also I have all my worlds and datapacks installed already.

title: Minecraft Bedrock Edition is better than Java, right?
self_text: My friend and I are playing on bedrock edition and it's so much easier to play on because you don't have to worry about the world breaking when someone else is messing around. We're still having a lot of fun though. What do you guys think?

title: Minecraft: Pocket Edition - How to transfer a world?
self_text: I have a really old world that I created on my iPad, and now I want to transfer it to my PC.  I'm running the latest version of the game, but it says "Can't transfer worlds between devices."   How can I transfer my world?
